N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 1400.4 - Nonrefundable retainer fee

State Regulations

An attorney shall not enter into an
arrangement for, charge or collect a nonrefundable retainer fee from a client. An attorney may enter into a "minimum fee" arrangement with a client that
provides for the payment of a specific amount below which the fee will not fall
based upon the handling of the case to its conclusion. Notes
